name: Urban Thread Kyiv Center
shortDescription: A fashion clothing store in the center of Kyiv.
description: A wide range of stylish clothing and accessories for men, women, and children. Our store is known for its unique collections, blending classic and modern fashion. We offer personalized customer service to ensure every client feels special. Located in the heart of Kyiv, we are easily accessible to everyone.
departments: Women's Clothing, Men's Clothing, Children's Clothing
